body.p:
You may want to provide all translators or those working on the same project with the same profile settings and shortcuts. You can do this in the following way:
Prepare all settings on one workstation.
Stop on all the workstations to receive the shared profile.
Copy the file eqfprow.prp, which contains all settings, from directory \otm\property to a diskette or a drive shared among all translators.
Put the copied file in the \otm\property directory of each translatorâ€™s workstation.
